column6: The Illuminati gather to plan for the death of everything. Infinity gems, old wounds, lies, agendas and universal incursions are all on the agenda!
column8: | artist (cover):Jock | editor:Tom Brevoort | colorist:Frank D'Armata | letterer:Chris Eliopoulos | penciler:Steve Epting | writer:Jonathan Hickman | inker:Rick Magyar
